file_content.text: If you see the Revan, tell of our obedience. Farewell.
We bow to you, mighty warriors.
You honor us with your presence, great one.
Greetings to you, powerful stranger.
Welcome to our home. We are servants of the Revan, custodians of the Infinite Engine.
Revan brought you people here centuries ago. How are you still alive?
You should be dead.
Many generations have come and gone since the Revan built our home, but still our people serve.
I don't see anything infinite-looking around here.
What is the Infinite Engine?
Can you not feel this wondrous machine's power?
You're wasting your time. Revan's been dead for centuries.
Not anymore.
Your words are hollow. The Revan is endless, like the Infinite Engine.
The ages pass, and the Infinite Engine grows. It was the size of a fingertip when we came here, and it sustained few.
Now, the Infinite Engine is large enough to sustain many of our people. It fulfills our every need. Food, clothing, tools... even weapons and mechanical beings.
Power like that belongs in the hands of the Empire. Step aside.
I'm taking it.
Tell me everything you know about the Infinite Engine--starting with where it came from.
Where did Revan get this thing?
All we know is that the Infinite Engine was once part of an even greater machine--one that built the Revan's mighty empire.
More than that, we cannot say. Only the Revan knows the Infinite Engine's secrets. We are merely caretakers.
If you become a servant of the Revan, the Infinite Engine will also provide for you.
Your services are no longer required. Give that machine to me.
Surrender the Infinite Engine.
I have better things to do than join your little cult.
I serve no one.
The Revan decreed, only those who nurture the Infinite Engine may reap its bounties.
Don't make me kill you.
Leave this place.
We swore to the Revan we would protect and nurture the Infinite Engine. As we sustain it, so does it sustain us.
Without the Infinite Engine, our people will wither and die. However, we are willing to gift you a seed from it.
The seed will require many ages of nurturing, but one day you will have an Infinite Engine just like ours.
I'm not leaving here without that machine.
The Empire won't wait.
The Revan warned us someone might come to steal the Infinite Engine. We promised never to allow that.
Give me this "seed," and I'll leave you alone.
You have a deal.
Gathering the seed will diminish our Infinite Engine for a time, but our people will survive.
Farewell. We will take the Infinite Engine deeper into our home and await the Revan's return.
Your gift is most generous. Tell the Revan I said hello if you see him.
Thank you.
You do that.
Revan's dead, you moron.
The seed is yours. Go in peace.
